alert.note: Alert for Benton (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 23 at 9:11PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Benton County through 1000 PM CDT... At 911 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm 3 miles northwest of Decatur, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Rogers... Bentonville... Bella Vista... Pea Ridge... Gentry... Gravette... Decatur... Garfield... Gateway... Hiwasse... Miller... Centerton... Avoca... Hill Top... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 87 and 93. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for northwestern Arkansas.
